mapper.select: select s_comName,trunc((s_5point*5+s_4point*4+s_3point*3+s_2point*2+s_1point*1)/(s_5point+s_4point+s_3point+s_2point+s_1point),2) starAvg from starinfo where s_comname like '%'||#{comName}||'%'
select * from starInfo where s_comName like '%'||#{comName}||'%'

select s.s_comName, c.c_comimg,(s.s_5point*5+s.s_4point*4+s.s_3point*3+s.s_2point*2+s.s_1point*1)/(s.s_5point+s.s_4point+s.s_3point+s.s_2point+s.s_5point) from companyInfo c, starInfo s where c.c_comName=s.s_comName and c.c_comName like '%'||#{comName}||'%'
select count(*) from starinfo where upper(s_comname) like upper('%'||#{comName}||'%')
select count(*) from starUser where s_comName=#{s_comName} and s_id=#{s_id}
mapper.update: update starinfo set s_1point=s_1point+1 where s_comName=#{comName}
update starinfo set s_2point+1 where s_comName=#{comName}
update starinfo set s_3point+1 where s_comName=#{comName}
update starinfo set s_4point+1 where s_comName=#{comName}
update starinfo set s_5point+1 where s_comName=#{comName}
